bibl.title: Greek Literary Papyri from the Strasbourg Collection.
bibl.note: 1. Inv. 2374 verso. Homeric exercice. Homer, Il. VI, 448-455. Third century B.C. (= Pack2 1185). - 2. Inv. 1876. Homer, Il. XIII, 297-302. Second century A.D. (= Pack2 905). - 3. Inv. 1536. Homer, Il. XV, 301-314. First century A.D. (= Pack2 920). - 4. Inv. 1827. Homer, Od. VIII, 214-230. End of first century A.D. (= Pack2 1070). - 5. Inv. W.G. 304 A-307. Euripides, Lyrics. Third century B.C. (= Pack2 426). - 6. Inv. 2346. Declamatio in Alcibiadem. First century A.D. (= Pack2 2497). - 7. Inv. 2493 verso. Mythological fragment. First or second century A.D. (= Pack2 2453). - 8. Inv. 1187. Medical fragment. First or second century A.D. (= Pack2 2372; Marganne 168).
